statements: DELETE FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE connection_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE connection_id = 100 AND (bytes_sent > 1000 OR bytes_received > 5000);
DELETE FROM vpn_connections WHERE user_id = 123 AND connection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-03-01' AND username = 'test_user';
DELETE FROM Bandwidth_Usage_Data WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2021-05-01';
DELETE FROM Connections WHERE status = 'Inactive' AND end_time <= NOW();
